about: I'm passionate about making others' lives better and easier. Whether I'm creatively trying to remove pain points via code or a listening ear or volunteerin gas a meditation teacher my sense of satisfaction comes from helping others and always learning.

coursera: Machine Learning by Stanford University on Coursera
Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter tuning, Regularization and Optimization

work.description: Promptly took over the management and maintenance of the data team's front-end analytics implementation. Implemented custom pipeline monitoring in Python via Jenkins job.

Automated a large portion of a Growth Engineer's worth of work while ensuring complete, and easy tracking customization via dashboard implementation for Analytics Team by building an in-house, mono-repo system to manage data and integrate 3rd party tools with Node, React, AWS S3, SQL, and Heroku. Eliminated the need for continual coding, testing, reviewing content for our webinars team by devising a headless CMS to increase velocity and accuracy. Overall, ensured content, uptime, and analytics for landing pages with 200,000 daily visitors by creating and collaborating across teams on several APIs and numerous landing pages including machine learning, design, and growth.
Debugging existing and developng new Swift projects: social media and location-based apps.
Remotely providing web design and front-end development services. Projects completed for Tylenol, Aveeno, and others. Designed iPhone/iPad app for Tylenol as well.
Toured and recorded for Bob Marley's youngest son. International touring. Grammy nominated album track recording. VH1, MTV, Jimmy Kimmel, BBC.

stack.description: To host JSON file for all content within this site. No need to deploy new code changes for content.
Version control integrated with Herokuapp for continuous deployment and ease of use in implemented beta, staging, and production evironments. Leveraging Codeship for Continuous Integration.

other_experience.heading: Stanford University
other_experience.description: Tested the viability of user-defined circuits to process audio signals using a nodal analysis algorithm based on M. Zwolinski's research. C++
